Currently working as a Data Analyst at Just Eat Takeaway.com, Daniel has achieved First Class Honours in BSc Economics at Swansea University. During his studies, he spent a year working for CheckoutSmart as a Business Analyst and further built his skills continuing this work part-time alongside his studies. A personable character who is motivated by supporting team members to achieve their goals. Praised as being able to work efficiently in teams or on his initiative, he is incredibly reliable and trustworthy with strong leadership skills. These attributes and more have been demonstrated through extensive work, Scouting and being on the committee of a large university club.
